User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Allow all search engines to crawl the site
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /org/dashboard
Disallow: /volunteer/dashboard
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /private/

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://swaed.ae/sitemap.xml

# Crawl delay (optional)
Crawl-delay: 1

# Specific rules for major search engines
User-agent: Googlebot
Allow: /
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /org/dashboard
Disallow: /volunteer/dashboard

User-agent: Bingbot
Allow: /
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /org/dashboard
Disallow: /volunteer/dashboard

# Block access to sensitive areas
User-agent: *
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /org/dashboard
Disallow: /volunteer/dashboard
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /private/
Disallow: /*.json$
Disallow: /*?*
Disallow: /search?
Disallow: /login
Disallow: /register
